title: Yutaka Banno
text: is a Japanese <a href="politician">politician</a> of the <a href="Democratic%20Party%20of%20Japan">Democratic Party of Japan</a>, a member of the <a href="House%20of%20Representatives%20of%20Japan">House of Representatives</a> in the <a href="Diet%20of%20Japan">Diet</a> (national legislature). A native of <a href="Nagoya%2C%20Aichi">Nagoya, Aichi</a> he attended <a href="Nagoya%20Institute%20of%20Technology">Nagoya Institute of Technology</a> both as undergraduate and graduate. Upon graduation, he joined <a href="Japanese%20National%20Railways">Japanese National Railways</a> in 1985 and <a href="Central%20Japan%20Railway%20Company">JR Central</a> in 1987 when Japanese National Railways was privatized. He left JR Central in 1994. In 2000 he was elected to the House of Representatives for the first time after an unsuccessful run in 1996.
